//                          CONFIGS.TXT
//----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
//
// Set the paths for your dolphin exe and the sound you want to play here.
// 
// If you do not want a sound to be played, leave the sound path blank.
//
// Do not edit anything other than what occurs directly after the '='.
// Care for trailing whitespaces!
////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

DOLPHIN_PATH=
START_SOUND_PATH=sounds/menu-ok.wav
KEY_BUTTON=0x1000

////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
// Here are the values for each of the buttons:
// You can also use button combinations i.e. A+B = 0x0300, or L+R+A+Start = 0x1160
//  START           = 0x1000
//  A               = 0x0100
//  B               = 0x0200
//  X               = 0x0400
//  Y               = 0x0800
//  Z               = 0x0010
//  HARD PRESS R    = 0x0020
//  HARD PRESS L    = 0x0040
//  D-PAD LEFT      = 0x0001
//  D-PAD RIGHT     = 0x0002
//  D-PAD DOWN      = 0x0004
//  D-PAD UP        = 0x0008
//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
